definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
materialism, philosophical doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
to appoint people by favoritism (idiom); nepotism/corrupt appointment

pinyin: bian4 zheng4 wei2 wu4 zhu3 yi4

definition: philosophy of idealism, the doctrine that external reality is a product of consciousness
the philosophy of materialism, doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
to appoint people according to their merits (idiom); appointment on the basis of ability and integrity
to wish for the whole world to be in chaos (idiom)
pinyin: wei2 kong3 tian1 xia4 bu4 luan4

definition: philosophy of idealism, the doctrine that external reality is a product of consciousness
voluntarism/metaphysical view, esp. due to Schopenhauer 叔本華|叔本华[Shu1 ben3 hua2], that the essence of the world is willpower

sentences.english: Muddy grass and tiny gray mounds of melting snow.
sentences.chinese: 草上粘满泥污，唯唯一的灰色小雪堆正在溶化。

sentences.english: Even if everything dictionary at hand, we can not only lead them.
sentences.chinese: 即便手头的词典应有尽有，也不能唯它们的马首是瞻。

sentences.english: It avoids the intellectualism of christian theology .
sentences.chinese: 它回避宗教神学的唯理智论。

sentences.english: I: Is thatonly reason why you are leaving?
Nevertheless, Nietzsche was firmly against Scientism.
sentences.chinese: 但是，尼采坚决反对唯科学主义。

sentences.english: Tang has also written short novels and stage dramas, and directed theater productions.
sentences.chinese: 汤唯也写过短片小说和舞台戏，导演戏剧作品。

sentences.english: The Senate shall have the sole Power to try all Impeachments.
sentences.chinese: 唯参议院具有审判一切弹劾案之权。

sentences.english: The film also stars Cannes best actor winner Tony Leung Chiu-wai and Chinese newcomer Tang Wei.
sentences.chinese: 主演还有嘎纳电影节影帝梁朝伟和中国青年演员汤唯。

sentences.english: It is very difficult to teach English in junior middle school.
sentences.chinese: 唯初中学生与五岁小孩难于管教，各位以为然否？

sentences.english: British overseers of Hong Kong sometimes seem to be doing Beijing's bidding.
sentences.chinese: 香港的英国官署有时似乎唯北京之命是从。

sentences.english: The only woman and the hero is also sad, only his wife and also difficult to find work.
sentences.chinese: 唯女人与英雄难过也，唯老婆与工作难找也。

sentences.english: The only woman and the hero is also sad, only his wife and also difficult to find work.
sentences.chinese: 唯女人与英雄难过也，唯老婆与工作难找也。

sentences.english: He capable of independent thinking and action, not only from friends.
sentences.chinese: 他能够独立思考和行动，而非唯朋友是从。

sentences.english: Her acting is good, both her role and the plot are necessary.
sentences.chinese: 汤唯的表演出色，她的角色和情节对剧情都是必要的。

sentences.english: I see almost all girls in TangWei's love.
sentences.chinese: 从汤唯的爱情故事里，我看到了几乎所有女生的影子。

sentences.english: I’m the only me in the whole wide world.

definition: the Way of the King/statecraft/benevolent rule/virtuous as opposed to the Way of Hegemon 霸道
one word says it all (idiom, from Analects); to cut a long story short/in a nutshell
classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
to be all the same way (literary)
that being the case/then/in that case
